apple_vendor_description: This depiction on Apple devices showcases a couple, a man and another person, with medium and medium-light skin tones, united by a vibrant red heart floating between them, a hallmark of Appleâ€™s expressive emoji library. The figures, rendered with smooth gradients and realistic lighting, have a warm, inviting presence, their soft rounded edges and gentle posture symbolizing love, partnership, and deep connection between two individuals.
